name: @zk-medical/circuits
description: Circom circuits for medical data ZK proofs

scripts.trusted-setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 build/pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot12_0000.ptau build/pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot12_0001.ptau build/pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup-circuit: snarkjs groth16 setup build/medical_eligibility.r1cs build/pot12_final.ptau build/medical_eligibility_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/medical_eligibility_0000.zkey build/medical_eligibility_0001.zkey --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/medical_eligibility_0001.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.verify-proof: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
scripts.setup-all: npm run compile && npm run trusted-setup && npm run setup-circuit && npm run generate-verifier
